TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CachingHint extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定是否缓存图块画笔对象。

span.span: Specifies whether to cache tiled brush objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ，不会缓存和对象的呈现内容。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，无论场景中的画笔如何变化，而不是使用缓存来提供好处，因为它可节省视频内存。In static scenarios where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当使用静态内容的画笔以非静态方式使用时，的默认行为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]是每隔一帧重新呈现画笔的全部内容，即使内容不变。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render the entire content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，当静态或映射到旋转三维对象的图面上时，将发生这种情况。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现静态内容可能会对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过在要缓存的画笔上设置附加属性，可以使用平铺画笔对象的缓存版本来提高性能。By setting the attached property on the brush to Cache, you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 和属性值是相对大小的值，用于确定当对象因刻度的变化而应重新生成的时间。 The and property values are relative size values that determine when the object should be regenerated due to changes in scale. 例如，通过将属性设置为2.0， 只需在其大小超过当前缓存大小的两倍时重新生成缓存。For example, by setting the property to 2.0, the cache for the only needs to be regenerated when its size exceeds twice the size of the current cache. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将缓存提示选项用于。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet3)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.CachingHint Cache = int32(1)

summary.span: 使用 设置指定的缓存提示将图块画笔对象缓存在离屏缓冲区中。

span.span: Cache the tiled brush objects in an off-screen buffer, using the caching hints specified by the settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.CachingHint Unspecified = int32(0)
